landing.title: Swiss Civic AI Study
landing.subtitle: A short academic study on data donation and trust in open-source AI
landing.whatWeStudyText: We explore how people decide whether to donate anonymized chat questions for AI language model research.
landing.researcher: Sabine Wildemann, Data Science & Business Analytics
landing.program: DBU Digital Business University of Applied Sciences · Prof. Daniel Ambach

consentModal.title: Before we start
consentModal.voluntary: your participation is voluntary and you may stop at any time
consentModal.confirm_checkbox: I confirm the above and agree to participate

declinedPage.tryApertus: Want to use Apertus for your daily questions? Try it out!

baseline.title: Before We Start
baseline.subtitle: Just 3 quick questions about you

techComfort.question: I am comfortable using new digital technology (like AI chatbots, new apps, or online tools).

privacyConcern.question: In general, I am concerned about how my personal information is used online.

ballotFamiliarity._purpose: Baseline familiarity with Swiss ballot initiatives - covariate for analysis
ballotFamiliarity.question: How familiar are you with Swiss ballot initiatives?

baseline.validationError: Please answer this question to continue

instruction.aboutText1: In this study, we explore how people use a chatbot in a civic context and how they decide whether their anonymized chat questions may be used for academic AI research.
instruction.aboutText2: To explore this, the study combines a short hands-on interaction with a chatbot and follow-up questions about your experience.
instruction.headline: Step 1 of 3 — Try the Chatbot
instruction.text1: In this first step, you will interact with a chatbot designed to provide information about Swiss ballot initiatives.
instruction.text2: The chatbot is based on a Swiss open-source AI language model. Such models are trained to understand questions and generate text-based answers, similar to other chat-based tools you may already know.
instruction.text3: The AI model used for the chatbot, Apertus, is a Swiss open-source large language model developed by EPFL, ETH Zurich, and the Swiss National Supercomputing Centre.
instruction.task: Please ask 2–3 questions about Swiss ballot initiatives.
instruction.taskSubtitle: This helps you get a sense of how the system works before continuing with the study.
instruction.example1: What is the Klimafonds Initiative about?
instruction.example2: Explain the Cash Initiative and the counter-proposal.
instruction.example3: What are the main arguments for and against the SRG Initiative?

chat.title: Swiss Ballot Chatbot
chat.subtitle: Ask 2–3 questions about Swiss ballot initiatives (answering takes up to 20 sec)
chat.thinking: Searching data... takes up to 20 sec
chat.maxReached: Thanks — you can now continue to the survey.
chat.validationError: Please ask at least 2 questions to continue.

donation.headline: Step 2 of 3 — Your decision about data donation
donation.transition: You have just used the chatbot. Now we ask you to decide whether your anonymized chat questions may be used for academic AI research.

conditionA.intro: You have just finished testing the chatbot. To help improve this Swiss open-source model, we invite you to donate your anonymized chatbot questions.
conditionA.text: Your anonymized chat questions would be used to improve a Swiss open-source AI model for academic research. Data would be handled securely and not used for commercial purposes.

conditionB.intro:
You have just finished testing the chatbot. To help improve this Swiss open-source model, we invite you to donate your anonymized chatbot questions.
Please review the data facts below to make an informed decision:

conditionC.intro: You have just finished testing the chatbot. To help improve this Swiss open-source model, we invite you to donate your anonymized chatbot questions. First, you can configure how your data will be used.

conditionD.intro: You have just finished testing the chatbot. To help improve this Swiss open-source model, we invite you to donate your anonymized chatbot questions. Please review the data facts below. You can also configure how your data will be used.

donation.dashboardHelper: You can leave the default settings or adjust them before deciding.
donation.decisionQuestion: Do you want to donate your anonymized chat questions for research purposes?

confirmDonate.title: Thank You!
confirmDonate.message: Your support helps us improve this ballot chatbot for everyone.
confirmDonate.nextStep: Your feedback in the next step will make this tool even better for future users like you.

confirmDecline.title: Thank You!
confirmDecline.message: We appreciate your participation in this study.
confirmDecline.nextStep: Your feedback in the next step is valuable and will help us improve this chatbot.

dnl.title: AI Model Facts
dnl.provenanceValue: Built by EPFL, ETH Zurich & CSCS in Switzerland
dnl.ingredientsValue: Only publicly available data from 1,000+ languages & sources
dnl.protectionValue: Personal data removed before training; respects opt-outs
dnl.complianceValue: Follows Swiss privacy & copyright laws, EU AI Act standards
dnl.freshnessValue: Includes Swiss German & Romansh; data through January 2025

dashboard.title: Configure Your Data Donation

scope.label: What data would you like to share?

purpose.label: How may your data be used?

storage.label: Where should your data be stored?

retention.label: How long should your data be kept?

dashboard.revocability: You can change these settings in your dashboard anytime.

_hypothesisMapping.Q3_transparency: MC-T: Manipulation check for H1 (Transparency). Expected: Higher in B & D (with DNL)
_hypothesisMapping.Q4_control: MC-C: Manipulation check for H2 (User Control). Expected: Higher in C & D (with Dashboard)
_hypothesisMapping.Q5_risk: OUT-RISK: H3 interaction mechanism. Expected: Lowest in D, highest in A
_hypothesisMapping.Q12_openFeedback: QUAL: Qualitative insight into decision reasoning

survey.stepHeadline: Step 3 of 3 — Your View on Data Use
survey.title: Final Questions
survey.subtitle: Please answer the following questions about your experience

transition.title: Almost done!
transition.message: Finally, just a few questions about yourself...
transition.reminder: REMINDER: The data donation was simulated for research purposes. Your chat questions were NOT actually stored.

transparency._expectedPattern: Higher in B & D (with DNL) than A & C
transparency.intro: Please indicate your agreement with the following statements:
transparency.q1: The information about how my anonymized chat questions may be used was clear.
transparency.q2: I understood what would happen to my anonymized chat questions if I agreed to share them.

control._expectedPattern: Higher in C & D (with Dashboard) than A & B
control.intro: Please indicate your agreement with the following statements:
control.q1: I felt I had control over how my anonymized chat questions could be used.
control.q2: I felt I had meaningful choices about sharing my anonymized chat questions.

risk._expectedPattern: Lowest in D (high transparency reduces risk), highest in A
risk.intro: Please indicate your agreement with the following statements:
risk.traceability: Even if anonymized, my chat questions could be traced back to me.
risk.misuse: My anonymized chat questions could be used in ways I would not agree with.

trust._expectedPattern: Exploratory - not required for H1-H3 testing
trust.q1: I trust the system behind this chatbot to handle anonymized questions responsibly.

chatbotQuestion.question: This chatbot helps people with questions about:

education.question: What is your highest level of education?

votingEligibility._purpose: Voting eligibility - collected as demographic variable for analysis
votingEligibility.question: Are you eligible to vote in Swiss federal elections?
votingEligibility.eligible: I am eligible to vote in Swiss federal elections
votingEligibility.notEligible: I live in Switzerland but am not eligible to vote

openFeedback.question: What mattered most for your data donation decision?
openFeedback.note: (Optional. Your answer helps us understand decision-making.)

survey.validationError: Please answer all required questions before submitting
survey.submissionError: Failed to submit survey. Please try again.

debrief.title: Thank You for Participating!
debrief.simulationNote: The data donation was SIMULATED. Your chat questions were NOT stored or used. Only your survey answers were recorded anonymously.
debrief.studyPurpose: We're researching what makes people comfortable donating their data to train open-source artificial intelligent models. Your responses help design better privacy-respecting AI systems.
debrief.emailPrompt: Enter your email to receive the study results (optional):
debrief.institution: Institution: Digital Business University of Applied Sciences
